languages.text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Ты отказываешь мне в такой мелочи, не узнав даже, что это? Вы настолько боитесь непривычного? Прискорбно".
{n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Ты отказываешь мне в такой мелочи, не узнав даже, что это? Вы настолько боитесь непривычного? Прискорбно".

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが目を細める。{/n}「それがどんなものか知ることもなく、ささやかな願いを断るのか？未知のものがそんなにも恐ろしいのか？まさに悲劇だな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが目を細める。{/n}「それがどんなものか知ることもなく、ささやかな願いを断るのか？未知のものがそんなにも恐ろしいのか？まさに悲劇だな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你连这是什么东西都还不知道，就断然拒绝？你就这么害怕陌生的东西吗？真是可悲。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“你连这是什么东西都还不知道，就断然拒绝？你就这么害怕陌生的东西吗？真是可悲。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous me refusez une telle vétille sans même savoir de quoi il s'agit ? Avez-vous donc si peur de l'inconnu ? Comme c'est tragique... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Vous me refusez une telle vétille sans même savoir de quoi il s'agit ? Avez-vous donc si peur de l'inconnu ? Comme c'est tragique... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Me prohíbe semejante nimiedad sin saber siquiera de qué se trata? ¿Tanto miedo le tiene a lo desconocido? Menuda tragedia».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Me prohíbe semejante nimiedad sin saber siquiera de qué se trata? ¿Tanto miedo le tiene a lo desconocido? Menuda tragedia».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr verweigert mir eine derartige Bagatelle, ohne zu wissen, worum es geht? Habt Ihr solche Angst vor dem Unbekannten? Wie tragisch."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ihr verweigert mir eine derartige Bagatelle, ohne zu wissen, worum es geht? Habt Ihr solche Angst vor dem Unbekannten? Wie tragisch."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri kısılıyor.{/n} "Daha ne olduğunu bile bilmeden beni böyle küçücük bir şeyden mahrum mu bırakacaksın? Aşina olmadığın şeylerden bu kadar mı korkuyorsun? Ne kadar trajik..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow.{/n} "You would deny me such a trifle without even knowing what it is? Are you so afraid of the unfamiliar? How tragic."
